<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_email_action"><sysevent_email_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><advanced_condition/><affected_field_on_event/><collection>incident</collection><condition table="incident">assigned_toISEMPTY^assignment_group!=d625dccec0a8016700a222a0f7900d06^assignment_group!=97038d19c87da000b7cbdeafe0437786^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assigned_to" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item display_table="sys_user_group" display_value="Service Desk" endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="d625dccec0a8016700a222a0f7900d06"/><item display_table="sys_user_group" display_value="Facilities" endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="97038d19c87da000b7cbdeafe0437786"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><content_type>multipart/mixed</content_type><description/><event_name>incident.assigned.to.group</event_name><event_parm_1>false</event_parm_1><event_parm_2>false</event_parm_2><exclude_delegates>false</exclude_delegates><force_delivery>false</force_delivery><from/><generation_type>event</generation_type><group/><group_field>assignment_group</group_field><importance/><include_attachments>false</include_attachments><item>event.parm1</item><item_table/><list/><list_field/><mandatory>false</mandatory><message><![CDATA[Hello ${assignment_group} Team,

${comments}]]></message><message_html/><message_list/><message_text/><name>MXL - Incident assigned to my group</name><omit_watermark>false</omit_watermark><order/><push_message_only>false</push_message_only><recipient_fields>assignment_group</recipient_fields><recipient_groups/><recipient_users/><reply_to/><send_self>false</send_self><sms_alternate/><style/><subject>Escalation to the ${assignment_group} group - ${number}</subject><subscribable>false</subscribable><sys_class_name>sysevent_email_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2006-02-11 01:16:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>56ae47dfc611227501b04310882ac2ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MXL - Incident assigned to my group</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Mobile UI" source="com.glide.ui.m">e35da7982c6b210038845c0140ddae49</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_email_action_56ae47dfc611227501b04310882ac2ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hsgill</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-02 14:51:30</sys_updated_on><sys_version/><template/><type>email</type><user/><user_field/><weight>50</weight></sysevent_email_action></record_update>
